div.note: The following are extracts from/summary of Conde, Historia de la dominacion, vol. 1, pp. 1-7.
div.ab: Conde. La dominación de los Arabés
de los campos de Yemen. Islam = seguridad y resignation. unde Muslimes. Idolatrous antes Mahomad.

Saad ben Ahmed Cadi de la ciudad de Toledo decia que fueran 2 generaciones de Arabes in Arabia. One is extinct tribes of Ad, of Themud, Tesm y Jadis. Los que permanecen son dos castas de Cahtan y Adnan. el imperio estaba en la cabila o tribu de Cahtan. y la familia de los Reyes Homiares. Kings Lords y Tobeos. Campiñas di Irak o Caldea.

Homiar tribu adoraba el sol, Canenah a la Luna. Misam la estrella Aldebaran. Laham y Jedam, Jupiter Estrella. Tay la constellacion de Sohail. Kais la Ashera al Obur. Asad la de Mercurio. Tzaquif un tempillo Alat en las alturas de Nahla. Some believed in ye resurrection & some sacrificed a camel or horse on the tombs.

Mahomad naciò en Mecca ciudad del Hegiaz. Conde, The domination of the Arabs from the lands of Yemen. Islam = security and resignation [i.e. resignación]. whence Muslims. Idolatrous before Muhammad. Saad ben Ahmed, qadi [judge of Islamic law] of the city of Toledo, said that there were 2 generations of Arabs in Arabia. One is extinct tribes of Ad, of Themud, Tesm and Jadis. Those who remain are two castes [i.e. lines] of Cahtan and Adnan. The empire was in the tribe [cabila] or tribe [tribu] of Cahtan. and the family of the Himyarite Kings. Kings, Lords and Successors [Conde: 'Tobeos ó sucesores']. Countryside of [Conde: 'de'] Iraq or Chaldea. Himyarite tribe worshipped the sun, Canenah the moon, Misam the star Aldebaran, Laham and Jedam the star Jupiter, Tay the constellation Suhail [Vela], Kais [the star] Ashera al Obur, Asad that of Mercury, Tzaquif a small temple [Conde: 'templillo'] Alat in the heights of Nahla. Some believed in the resurrection [of the dead, not specifically of Christ: Conde] and some sacrificed a camel or horse on the tombs. Muhammad was born in Mecca, a city in the Hejaz. there the Anct Temple AlbaramConde has 'Alharam' to true God. founded by Ismael. Mahomad of tribe or Cabila de Coraix tribe of Quraysh of great family. Conqueror at Honain at Bedrè & Ohod.
Mahomad = CadijahKhadija, the Prophet's first wife. Not in Conde.

Arabs counted from the epoch of the Ethiopic war or “la entrada del Señor del Alfil o del Elefantethe entry of the Lord of the Elephant ('alfil' is Arabic for elephant). Invasion of Mecca by the Ethiopian Christian governor of Yemen, Abrahah al-Ashram, in c.570-1AD.. In this Abdelmotaleb Xi.e. indicating above, Muhammad's grandfather defended his country & destroyed the army of the Ethiopian King. This war mentioned in the Koran. Jusuf ben Said of Illora writes about it also.
Medina Yatrib afterwards called Medinatalnabi = city of Prophet.

Mahomed born at dawn 8 of month Rebie primeraRabi al-Awwal (month in Islamic calendar) on tuesday 622 after Xt Christ .WG has misread here: Conde says Muhammad was born in 572AD, but that Hegira (Islamic calendar) begins in 622AD.
div.note: The following are extracts from/summary of Conde, Historia de la dominacion, vol. 1, pp. 22-30, 33.
div.ab: In year of Hegira 86. Ao Xt 705AH 86, 705AD died the Calif Abdelmelec. His son Walid ben Abdelmelic succeeded. He confirmed Muza ben Noseir i.e. Musa ibn Nusayr (c.640-c.716) in command of the troops in Africa, He & his son Abdelaziz conquered in Almagreb. beat the Moor tribes Masmuda. Zanhaga. Ketama & Hoara. Meruan son of Musa came to Tanja i.e. Tangier.

Certain Xtians of Gezira de Alandalus ofendida de su Rey Ruderic vinieron a Muza ben Noseir, y le incitaron a pasar con tropas a España. The channel or gut called Alzacac. El Rey Don Alfonso el Sabio made the chronicle of these times but la Caba the Donzella Alifa &c all Moorish fictions. The Calif applauded Muzas enterprise. Muza sent Taric ben Zeyad. He passed with quinientos caballeros Arabes en 4 barcos grandes ao 710 Certain Christians of Gezira of al-Andalus [Conde's translation: the peninsula of Spain], offended by their King Ruderic, came to Musa ibn Nusayr and incited him to cross with troops into Spain. The channel or gut called Alzacac. King Don Alfonso the Wise made the chronicle of these times but la Caba, the maiden [Conde has 'doncella'] Alifa etc all Moorish fictions [Conde, vol. 1, p. 25: part of story of why the Arabs crossed to Spain; la Caba, daughter of Count Don Julian]. The Calif applauded Musa's enterprise. Musa sent Taric ben Zeyad. He passed with four hundred Arab knights in 4 large ships in 710AD.. They took some places on the coast of Andalucia. & returned.

After this Taric landed with an army at Gezira Alhadra or Isla VerdeGreen Island. Taric beat the natives & fortified Gebal Taric Alfeth anciently. & burnt his Ships. Tadmir, Roderics captain there. He wrote to Roderic. Señor aqui han llegado gentes enemigas de la parte de Africa. yo no se si del cielo u de la tierra: yo me halle acometido de ellos de improviso: resisti con todas mis fuerzas para defender la entrada: pero me fue forzoso cedar a la muchedumbre y al impetu suyo, ahora a mi pesar acampan en nuestra tierra: ruegoos Señor, pues tanto os cumple que vengais a socorrernos con la mayor diligencia. y con cuanta gente se pueda allegar: venid vos Senor en persona que sera lo mejor.”My lord, enemy peoples from Africa have arrived here. I do not know if from heaven or earth: I found myself suddenly attacked by them: I resisted with all my strength to defend against their arrival: but I was forced to give in to the crowd and their momentum, now in spite of me they camp on our land: I beg, my lord, that it satisfies you to come to help us with the greatest diligence. and with however many people can be gathered: come yourself in person, my lord, which would be best.
He sent a fine body of cavalry Gothic who skirmished always with loss. The Muslimes commanded by Mugueiz el Rumi.
Roderic raised the whole country & came to
